Lecture series and integrated seminar 2 SWS

The lecture series 0335 L 146 module number 30654 gives an overview on microbially-catalyzed processes in the environment (above and below ground, in soil, surface water, air and other compartments). Additionally we look at options to apply such processes in biotechnology, for example in plastics degradation, oil degradation, precipitation of radioactive compounds, transformation of dioxins, nitrogenous compounds and many more.

The module can be filed in list A of the "Wahlpflichtbereich" of the master biotechnology or in the "Wahlbereich". The lecture series is a good preparation for the Geobiotechnology practical course that is offered in Februar.
Here is a link to an evaluation page of the faculty and it would be nice if you participated.
